abstract: Provides a list of all available languages.

## Return Value

An array containing all the available spell checking languages. The languages are ordered in the user’s preferred order as set in the system preferences.

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/automaticallyIdentifiesLanguages] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then text checking will automatically use this method as appropriate; otherwise, it will use the language set by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/setLanguage(_:)].

The older [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/checkSpelling(of:startingAt:language:wrap:inSpellDocumentWithTag:wordCount:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/checkGrammar(of:startingAt:language:wrap:inSpellDocumentWithTag:details:)]. methods will use the language set by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/setLanguage(_:)], if they are called with a `nil` language argument.

# availableLanguages

**Instance Property**

Provides a list of all available languages.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableLanguages: [String] { get }
```

## Return Value

An array containing all the available spell checking languages. The languages are ordered in the user’s preferred order as set in the system preferences.

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/automaticallyIdentifiesLanguages] is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then text checking will automatically use this method as appropriate; otherwise, it will use the language set by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/setLanguage(_:)].

The older [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/checkSpelling(of:startingAt:language:wrap:inSpellDocumentWithTag:wordCount:)] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/checkGrammar(of:startingAt:language:wrap:inSpellDocumentWithTag:details:)]. methods will use the language set by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpellChecker/setLanguage(_:)], if they are called with a `nil` language argument.

## Configuring Spell Checkers Languages

- **userPreferredLanguages**: Provides a subset of the available languages to be used for spell checking.
- **automaticallyIdentifiesLanguages**: Sets whether the spell checker will automatically identify languages.
- **language()**: Returns the current language used in spell checking.
- **setLanguage(_:)**: Returns whether the specified language is in the Spelling pop-up list.
